topic.title: Providing content to AI engines using DITA OT plugins

body.p:
As part of the DITA Open Toolkit Day 2025 conference in Copenhagen I presented a couple of DITA Open Toolkit plugins I developed which can use AI or provide content to be used by the AI:
DITA OT plugin to preprocess using AI - Apply AI in the DITA OT pre-processing stage for example to translate content at publishing time.
DITA OT plugin to apply AI validation rules on pre-processed content (with conrefs expanded) and create a report.
DITA OT plugin to create using AI from a Style Guide fine tuning JSONL content for the AI.
DITA OT plugin to upload Markdown content to an AI Assistant vector store.
DITA OT Summarize plugin - create a summary of an entire DITA Map in markdown.
If you find any of these subjects interesting the entire set of slides is attached below. You can also use the feedback form if you want to have discussions about any of these plugins.
